name: Luncheon Dungeon
description:
Rarthoth the Dragonborn has been stricken with the curse of Endless Hunger, he can only go 30 seconds without eating. Armed with his trusty frying pan he must rush into the Dungeon of the Dragonfruit Drake and claim its healing fruit while surviving off of the meals made of monsters fought along the way.

Kickstart your pan's heat by smacking monsters, food, and torches.

Explore the dungeon for precious spices to improve the quality of your food.

Controls

Move: WASD/L-Joystick

Pan: Q or F/R1 or Square/RB or X

Programming: DefinitelyNotAShark

Art: Fxy
